pending.title: Loading
pending.message: Please wait while we load your data.

unauthorized.title: Unauthorized access
unauthorized.message: You must be be logged to access to this feature.

forbidden.title: Access forbidden
forbidden.message: You don't have access to this feature.

unavailable.title: Platform temporarily unavailable
unavailable.message: Please try again later or contact an administrator.

pending.title: Loading
pending.message: Please wait while we load your data.

error.title: Load failure
error.message: We were unable to load your data.

pending.message: Please wait while we reload your data.

error.message: We were unable to reload your data.

pending.title: Save in progress
pending.message: Please wait while we save your data.

success.title: Successful save
success.message: Your data has been saved correctly.

warning.title: Save failure
warning.message: Please correct the errors on your form and try again.

error.title: Save failure
error.message: We were unable to save your data.

forbidden.title: Save forbidden
forbidden.message: You do not have the necessary rights to save this data.
